attributes.action: Install the same lie detectors on phones in the House of Commons Fees Office that are now being installed in Jobcentre Plus offices for use on claimants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lie detectors based on technology originally developed by Mossad for use on terrorist suspects are currently being installed on phone systems in Jobcentre Plus offices and DWP call centres around the UK.  If it is reasonable to subject all claimants, including the sick and disabled, to lie detector tests in order to protect the public purse then it must be reasonable to use the same precautions against MPs.  Alternatively, lie detectors – whose reliability has been repeatedly challenged by academics - should cease to be used by the state on any citizens.

rejection.details: Following a trial in Nottinghamshire, there are currently no plans to use lie detector technology in Job Centres.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
